remarks: Prove that the infinite geometric series of 1/2, 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + ... = 1.  Uses ~ geoisum1 .  This is a representation of .111... in binary with an infinite number of 1's.  Theorem ~ 0.999... proves a similar claim for .999... in base 10.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement: geoihalfsum $p |- sum_ k e. NN ( 1 / ( 2 ^ k ) ) = 1 $.
